name: clocks
description: A various collection of html clocks designed to be embeddable anywhere (a list of available clocks is coming soon but for now just look through the code)

scripts.build: rm dist/ -r -f && webpack && sass src/styles/:dist/styles/ && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.build:batch: (if exist rmdir dist /s /Q) && webpack && sass src/styles/:dist/styles/ && copy src\index.html dist\index.html

author: jamesinaxx
